Key Match Events: Finn Allen's 137-run onslaught powered New Zealand to seal a 45-run win against Pakistan in the 3rd T20I match.
Allen and Tim Seifert stitched up a 125-run partnership.
New Zealand ended up with a total of 224-7.
Babar Azam scored 58 runs from 37 balls.
Tim Southee led the Kiwi bowling attack with two wickets in his four-over spell.
Allen was named the 'Player of the Match' after his blitz knock in the first inning.
